description: Existing unist primitives for myst mdast - https://github.com/syntax-tree/unist

data.description: information associated by the ecosystem with the node; never specified by mdast

position.description: location of node in source file; must not be present for generated nodes

Literal.description: basic node with required string value

Parent.description: basic node with required node children

Point.description: one place in a source file

offset.description: offset character in the source file, 0-indexed

Position.description: location of a node in a source file

start.description: place of first character of parsed source region

end.description: place of first character after parsed source region, whether it exists or not

indent.description: start column at each index in the source region, for elements that span multiple lines
